english.segment1: Little girl terrified. Shed leave her room if only bruises would heal. A home is no place to hide. Her heart is breaking from the pain that she feels
english.segment2: Every days the same. She fights to find her way. She hurts, she breaks, she hides, and tries to pray. She wonders why, does anyone ever hear her when she cries
english.segment3: Today shes turning sixteen. Everyone singing, but she cant seem to smile. They never get past arms length. How could they act like everything is alright?. Shes pulling down her long sleeves. To cover all the memories that scars leave. She says,  maybe making me bleed will be the answer that could wash the slate clean
english.segment4: This is the dark before the dawn. The storm before the peace. Dont be afraid cause seasons change and. God is watching over you. He hears you
